Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)

Definition.WordDefinition:
encode
1. <algorithm, hardware> To convert {data} or some physical quantity into a given format. E.g. {uuencode}.
See also {encoder}.
2. <cryptography> To encrypt, to perform {encryption}.
(1999-07-06)

encode v : convert ordinary language into code; "We should encode the message for security reasons" [syn: {code}, {encipher}, {cipher}, {cypher}, {encrypt}, {inscribe}, {write in code}] [ant: {decode}]
